title: So I just got robbed
body:
All my ds games are missing....

Not my computer...

Not my ps4...

NOT EVEN MY DS!

JUST MY DS GAMES!!! 

WTF.... I'm half expecting a bomb to go off now seeing as nothing else was taken at least that I can see.

WTF is wrong with this world? 

I suspect the culprits were around the age of 12-17. Sigh FML
